A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Loved the movie. Very ballsy thing for Disney to do. Yes\, I will admit\, it has what seems like glaring issues or plot holes\, but I was riveted and surprised nearly the whole way through. I don't look for perfection in movies that much anymore and was able to enjoy the movie\, thoroughly as it was. I hope they go in an even more crazier direction in the next film.
